description:
Only need a small canister for a quick overnight? Upping your Valentine's Day picnic game with fondue? This compact canister is perfect for is perfect for a light, fast mission.

  • Isobutene/propane blend performs well at cooler temperatures
  • Designed for use with GSI Pinnacle Stoves
  • Nests inside nForm cooking systems
  • Dimensions are 9.1 x 7.1cm
name: GSI Isobutane 110 Fuel Canister
